mapper.select: SELECT tb_user.id, tb_user.employee_number, tb_user.nick_name, tb_user.user_pwd, tb_user.mobile, tb_user.email, tb_user_token.expiration_time, tb_user.is_admin FROM tb_user_token INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_user_token.user_id = tb_user.id WHERE tb_user.is_deleted = 0 AND tb_user_token.is_deleted = 0 AND tb_user_token.token = #{token, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT tb_user.*, tb_post.post_name, tb_professional_title.title_name, tb_department.dept_name FROM tb_user LEFT JOIN tb_post ON tb_user.post_id = tb_post.id AND tb_post.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_professional_title ON tb_user.professional_title_id = tb_professional_title.id AND tb_professional_title.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_department ON tb_user.department_id = tb_department.id AND tb_department.is_deleted = 0 WHERE tb_user.is_deleted = 0 AND tb_user.is_admin = 0
AND ( tb_department.full_id LIKE CONCAT('%-', #{dto.departmentId}) OR tb_department.full_id LIKE CONCAT('%-', #{dto.departmentId}, '-%') )
AND tb_user.employee_number = #{dto.employeeNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tb_user.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.nickName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND tb_user.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND tb_user.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
ORDER BY tb_user.id DESC
